slides.text:
Tools

This website doesn't use any 3rd party frameworks except for jQuery. I used Dreamweaver pretty much as a text editor to code this site. Contents are populated with JSON objects. Feel free to view source / inspect element anytime!

Responsive Design

No excuse to not support different devices. I researched some responsive design framework, and learned from existing solutions. This is the project list page layout in different page widths / devices.
